mapper.insert: insert into members( id, name, gender, postcode, location1, location2, pnum, email, birth, img, lv, pos, author2,point ) values( #{id}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{postCode}, #{location1}, #{location2}, #{pnum}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{img}, #{lv}, #{pos}, #{author2}, 0 )
mapper.update: update members set name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, postcode = #{postCode}, location1 = #{location1}, location2 = #{location2}, pnum = #{pnum}, email = #{email}, birth = #{birth}, img = #{img}, lv = #{lv}, pos = #{pos}, author2 = #{author2} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into message (m_no, to_id, send_id, m_title, m_con) values(mno_seq.nextval, #{to_id}, #{send_id}, #{m_title}, #{m_con})
mapper.select: select id from members where id != #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM message where send_id=#{send_id}
mapper.insert: insert into coupon(c_no,m_id, c_title, c_num) values(cu_seq.nextval,#{m_id},#{c_title}, #{c_num})
mapper.update: update members m set m.point = (select nvl(sum(p.NPOINT), 1) from point p where p.p_id = m.id) where id = #{p_id}
mapper.select: select c_no,m_id, c_title, c_num, TO_CHAR(c_edate,'YYYY/MM/DD') as c_edate, c_check from coupon where m_id=#{m_id} order by c_edate DESC
mapper.update: update coupon set c_check = 'O' where c_edate > SYSDATE and c_check = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM point where p_id=#{p_id}
mapper.update: update message set m_check = 'Y', o_date = sysdate where m_no=#{m_no}
mapper.select: select * from( select a.*, rownum rn from ( select t.* from TEAMMATCH t join players p on t.m_no = p.m_no where p.id= #{id} order by m_date ) a ) b where rn between #{first} and #{last}
select m.*, p.id, p.manner from preview p join p_match m on p.m_no = m.m_no where p.id = #{p_id}
